DataCloneError.text: The object can not be cloned.

HierarchyRequestError.text: The operation would yield an incorrect node tree.

IndexSizeError.text: The index is not in the allowed range.

InvalidAccessError.text: The object does not support the operation or argument.

InvalidModificationError.text: The object can not be modified in this way.

InvalidNodeTypeError.text: The supplied node is incorrect or has an incorrect ancestor for this operation.

InvalidStateError.text: The object is in an invalid state.

NamespaceError.text: The operation is not allowed by Namespaces in XML. [XMLNS]

NoModificationAllowedError.text: The object can not be modified.

NotFoundError.text: The object can not be found here.

SyntaxError.text: The string did not match the expected pattern.

TypeMismatchError.text: The type of the object does not match the expected type.

URLMismatchError.text: The given URL does not match another URL.

WrongDocumentError.text: The object is in the wrong document.
